data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moghaddam, Masumeh (2013): A review of the mealybugs (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Pseudococcidae, Putoidae and Rhizoecidae) of Iran, with descriptions of four new species and three new records for the Iranian fauna. Zootaxa 3632 (1): 1-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3632.1.1
